dcterms:creator: A. Ortega

dcterms:description: AV@CAR is a Spanish multichannel multimodal corpus for in-vehicle automatic audio-visual speech recognition, including both studio and in-car recordings with sequences of 20 people recorded under controlled conditions while repeating predefined phrases or sentences.
dcterms:title: AV@CAR

dcterms:creator: G. Potamianos
C. Neti
G. Gravier
A. Garg
A. W. Senior
dcterms:description: The IBM ViaVoice database is used for testing visual speech recognition systems, focusing on continuous speech recognition.
dcterms:title: IBM ViaVoice database
